PLUGIN_DESCRIPTION: Control Amplifier with IR using Volumio Events
DEVICE_NAME_DOC: LIRC device name where IR commands will be sent (e.g., 'receiver')
START_BUTTON_DOC: LIRC key name to send to switch the device on (e.g., KEY_POWER)
STOP_BUTTON_DOC: LIRC key name to send to switch the device off (e.g., KEY_POWER2)
VOL_UP_BUTTON_DOC: LIRC key name used to increase volume
VOL_DOWN_BUTTON_DOC: LIRC key name used to decrease volume
POWER_ON_ON_PLAY_DOC: Turn the amplifier on when playback starts
POWER_OFF_ON_STOP_DOC: Turn the amplifier off when playback stops
POWER_OFF_ON_PAUSE_DOC: Turn the amplifier off when playback is paused
POWER_OFF_DELAY_DOC: Seconds to wait before powering off after stop/pause
